AmountDC.name: AmountDC
AmountDC.description: For the header lines (LineNumber = 0) of an entry this is the SUM(AmountDC) of all lines

AmountDiscount.name: AmountDiscount
AmountDiscount.description: Discount amount in the default currency of the company

AmountDiscountExclVat.name: AmountDiscountExclVat
AmountDiscountExclVat.description: Discount amount exclude VAT in the default currency of the company

AmountFC.name: AmountFC
AmountFC.description: For the header this is the sum of all lines, including VAT

AmountFCExclVat.name: AmountFCExclVat
AmountFCExclVat.description: For the header this is the sum of all lines, excluding VAT

Currency.name: Currency
Currency.description: Currency for the invoice. Default this is the currency of the administration

DeliverToAddress.name: DeliverToAddress
DeliverToAddress.description: Address of delivery as per invoice delivery account

DeliverToContactPersonFullName.name: DeliverToContactPersonFullName
DeliverToContactPersonFullName.description: Name of delivery account's contact person as per invoice

DeliverToName.name: DeliverToName
DeliverToName.description: Name of the delivery account's customer as per invoice

Description.name: Description
Description.description: Description. Can be different for header and lines

DiscountType.name: DiscountType
DiscountType.description: Leading field of total discount. 1=Discount percentage, 2=Discount amount excl. VAT, 3=Discount amount incl. VAT, 4=Total amount excl. VAT, 5=Total amount incl. VAT

Document.name: Document
Document.description: Document that is manually linked to the invoice

DueDate.name: DueDate
DueDate.description: The due date for payments. This date is calculated based on the EntryDate and the Paymentcondition

ExtraDutyAmountFC.name: ExtraDutyAmountFC
ExtraDutyAmountFC.description: Extra duty amount in the currency of the transaction. Both extra duty amount and VAT amount need to be specified in order to differ this property from automatically calculated.

GAccountAmountFC.name: GAccountAmountFC
GAccountAmountFC.description: A positive value of the amount indicates that the amount is to be paid by the customer to your G bank account.In case of a credit invoice the amount should have negative value when retrieved or posted to Exact.

IncotermVersion.name: IncotermVersion
IncotermVersion.description: Version of Incoterm Supported version for Incoterms : 2010, 2020

InvoiceDate.name: InvoiceDate
InvoiceDate.description: Official date for the invoice. When the invoice is entered it's equal to the field 'EntryDate'. During the printing process the invoice date can be entered

InvoiceNumber.name: InvoiceNumber
InvoiceNumber.description: Assigned at entry or at printing depending on setting. The number assigned is based on the freenumbers as defined for the Journal. When printing the field InvoiceNumber is copied to the fields EntryNumber and InvoiceNumber of the sales entry

InvoiceTo.name: InvoiceTo
InvoiceTo.description: Reference to the Customer who will receive the invoice

InvoiceToContactPerson.name: InvoiceToContactPerson
InvoiceToContactPerson.description: Reference to the Contact person of the customer who will receive the invoice

InvoiceToContactPersonFullName.name: InvoiceToContactPersonFullName
InvoiceToContactPersonFullName.description: Name of the contact person of the customer who will receive the invoice

InvoiceToName.name: InvoiceToName
InvoiceToName.description: Name of the customer who will receive the invoice

IsExtraDuty.name: IsExtraDuty
IsExtraDuty.description: Indicates whether the invoice has extra duty

Journal.name: Journal
Journal.description: The journal code. Every invoice should be linked to a sales journal

OrderedByContactPerson.name: OrderedByContactPerson
OrderedByContactPerson.description: Contact person of customer who ordered the invoice

OrderedByContactPersonFullName.name: OrderedByContactPersonFullName
OrderedByContactPersonFullName.description: Name of contact person of customer who ordered the invoice

OrderedByName.name: OrderedByName
OrderedByName.description: Name of customer who ordered the invoice

OrderNumber.name: OrderNumber
OrderNumber.description: Number to identify the order. By default the number is based on a setting for the first free number, but you can post your own number.

PaymentCondition.name: PaymentCondition
PaymentCondition.description: The payment condition used for due date and discount calculation

SalesInvoiceOrderChargeLines.name: SalesInvoiceOrderChargeLines
SalesInvoiceOrderChargeLines.description: Collection of shipping cost and order charge lines. Only applicable in POST. Ignore the URL returns in GET.

SelectionCode.name: SelectionCode
SelectionCode.description: ID of selection code. Only supported by the Plus, Professional and Premium for Wholesale & Distribution and Manufacturing

StarterSalesInvoiceStatus.name: StarterSalesInvoiceStatus
StarterSalesInvoiceStatus.description: Starter Sales invoice status (for starter functionality)

Status.name: Status
Status.description: The status of the entry. 10 = draft. During the creation of an invoice draft records occur in the draft modus if during an invoice a new page with lines is triggered. If the user leaves the invoice in an abnormal way the draft invoices can be recovered. Draft invoices are not included in financial reports, balances etc. 20 = open. Open invoices can be changed. New invoices get the status open by default. 50 = processed. Processed invoices can't be changed anymore. Processing is done via printing. Processed invoices can't be reopened

Type.name: Type
Type.description: Indicates the type of invoice Values: 8020 - Sales invoices, 8021 - Sales credit note, 8023 - Direct sales invoice, 8024 - Direct credit note. Type 8023 and 8024 are only supported by the Plus, Professional and Premium editions for Wholesale & Distribution and Manufacturing

VATAmountDC.name: VATAmountDC
VATAmountDC.description: Total VAT amount in the default currency of the company

VATAmountFC.name: VATAmountFC
VATAmountFC.description: Total VAT amount in the currency of the transaction

Warehouse.name: Warehouse
Warehouse.description: Mandatory for direct sales invoice/credit note, cannot be set for normal sales invoice/credit note.

WithholdingTaxAmountFC.name: WithholdingTaxAmountFC
WithholdingTaxAmountFC.description: Withholding tax amount applied to sales invoice. Not supported in The Netherlands.

WithholdingTaxBaseAmount.name: WithholdingTaxBaseAmount
WithholdingTaxBaseAmount.description: Withholding tax base amount to calculate withholding amount. Not supported in The Netherlands.

WithholdingTaxPercentage.name: WithholdingTaxPercentage
WithholdingTaxPercentage.description: Withholding tax percentage applied to sales invoice. Not supported in The Netherlands.

YourRef.name: YourRef
YourRef.description: The invoice number of the customer

endpoint_info.good_to_know: Use this endpoint to create, read, update and delete sales invoices or direct sales invoices.Note: You must include a parameter for 'SalesInvoiceLines' to add sales invoice lines when you POST to the SalesInvoices endpoint. This parameter is not necessary when you PUT to this endpoint. Currently, assigning serial or batch numbers is not supported when you create or update direct sales invoices.Sales invoice describe the items that you sell to your customers.For more information about the sales invoice functionality in Exact Online, see About sales invoices  Direct sales invoices are entries that combine a normal sales invoice with a stock movement, whether it is in or out. For more information about the direct sales invoice functionality in Exact Online, see Create direct sales invoices or direct credit notes To view an example of the business use of this endpoint, see Rest API - Business example API sales invoice.
